data.title: DTI Contact Page and Directory of Key Officials
data.meta_description: You may reach the DTI through Customer Contact Center tel. 1-384 or 7791.3100, email address ask@dti.gov.ph, and cellphone (0917) 834.3330.
data.meta_site_name: Department of Trade and Industry Philippines
data.text:
Contact Us

Questions? Get in touch with our Customer Contact Center:

Monday-Sunday: 8:00 a.m. – 5:00 pm.

(except holidays)

Telephone: 1-DTI (384)

Email: ask@dti.gov.ph

Mobile: 0917.834.3330

Click for DTI Nationwide and Overseas Offices’ location map
